text: idiga nivibbaru (patniyaru) allahaneduru pascattapa paduvudu olleyadu. Nim'ma manas'sugalu valikondive. Nivibbaru avarige (pravadige) eduragi paraspara neravige ilididdare (nimage tilidirali;) allahanu avara raksakanagiddane mattu jibril hagu sakala sajjana visvasigalu mattu malakâ€Œgalu avara sahayakaragiddare
